title: Improved moduli of continuity for degenerate phase transitions
authors: Ugo Gianazza, Naian Liao and Jos\'e Miguel Urbano
abstract:
We substantially improve in two scenarios the current state-of-the-art
modulus of continuity for weak solutions to the $N$-dimensional, two-phase
Stefan problem featuring a $p-$degenerate diffusion: for $p=N\geq 3$, we
sharpen it to $$ \boldsymbol{\omega}(r) \approx \exp (-c| \ln r|^{\frac1N}); $$
for $p>\max\{2,N\}$, we derive an unexpected H\"older modulus.
